mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "Fresh Air Hoedown", "A Real Whingding", "El Paso Square Dance Festival and Old Fiddlers Contest ", "Glamour Fashions for the Square Dance". This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On the Record", "Idea Corral", "Round the Outside Ring", "The Square of the Month" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). The "Green Sheet Of Local Southern California News" features, "Clearing House Of Southern California Square Dance Activities Seen".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
